name: Bishoujo Renai Mahjong Series 2nd: Shiritsu Houou Gakuen: 2 Nen Junjou Gumi
overview: Shiritsu Houou Gakuen 2-Toshi Junai-Kumi is the sequel Shiritsu Houou Gakuen 1-Nen Junai-Gumi a Mahjong game that got different game modes. The most important ones are the vs mode to play mahjong against the computer, the free play mode that is an endless and the story mode in which the player controls a young boy that go to a private academy and there he will meet different girls during the conversations with them they will play mahjong with him, depending if he wins the mahjong matchs or not the story will be different and the game features different endings. In this second game there are also 3 different stories in the story mode (each of them with a main girl to interact). The game features voice acting for the girls characters and a 2d anime graphics engine.
